name: Aerodactyl
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Aerodactyl is your Active Pokemon, you may ignore all Poke-Bodies until the end of your turn. This power can't be used if Aerodactyl is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Alakazam
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card from 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Arcanine
AbilityText: When you play Arcanine from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to Arcanine.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any.
Attack2Text: Discard all Fire Energy cards attached to Arcanine.

name: Articuno
AbilityText: You can't attach Water Energy cards from your hand to Articuno.
Attack1Text: If there are any Water Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Articuno.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Pokemon in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Beedrill
AbilityText: When you play Beedrill from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. If you get 1 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If you get 2 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If you get 3 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage. If you get 4 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 90 more damage.

name: Crobat
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent has any Baby Pokemon, Basic Pokemon, or Evolution cards there, choose 1 of them. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck. This power can't be used if Crobat is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. If both of them are tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Dewgong
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't attach Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokemon during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost. Damage is calculated using the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost after applying effects to the Retreat Cost.

name: Flareon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Flareon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Flareon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack. If the discarded card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If both coins are heads, switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, do 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. For each tails, do 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gengar
AbilityText: When you play Gengar from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may put a Basic Pokemon (excluding Baby Pokemon) from your discard pile onto your Bench. Then, flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to that Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Gyarados
AbilityText: When you play Gyarados from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If Gyarados has 7 or more damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 100.

name: Houndoom
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage times the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon minus the number of your Benched Pokemon. (For example, if your opponent has 3 Benched Pokemon and you have 1, this attack will do 30 damage plus 40 more damage.)

name: Jolteon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Jolteon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Jolteon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon with at least 1 Energy card attached to it (yours and your opponent's).

name: Kabutops
AbilityText: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokemon, neither player can play Basic Pokemon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Ledian
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, Ledian can't become affected by a Special Condition. (Any other effects of attacks, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, and Trainer cards still happen.)
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Machamp
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks done to Machamp.
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, if your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, ignore this effect.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Magcargo
Attack1Text: Each player discard the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Magcargo in order to use this attack. If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Magcargo
AbilityText: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and and then shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent does the same.
Attack1Text: You may discard a Fire or Fighting basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a Fire Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If you discard a Fighting Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Magneton
AbilityText: When you play Magneton from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may move any number of basic Energy cards attached to your other Pokemon to Magneton.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Magneton when you use this attack. If you do, put damage counters equal to the amount of Energy cards removed in this way on any number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon in the way you like. (For example, if you discard 3 Lightning Energy cards, you can put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and 2 on another.)

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: If Magneton and the Defending Pokemon don't have the same number of Energy cards attached to them, the player controlling the Active Pokemon with the fewest number of Energy cards attached to it switches 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 damage times the number of your Benched Pokemon minus the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (For example, if your opponent has 1 Benched Pokemon and you have 3, this attack will do 30 damage plus 20 more damage.)

name: Moltres
AbilityText: You can't attach Fire Energy cards from your hand to Moltres.
Attack1Text: If there are any Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Moltres.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Moltres.

name: Nidoqueen
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Nidoqueen is on your Bench, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from your Active Pokemon and attach it to your Active Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads

name: Omastar
AbilityText: As long as Omastar is your Active Pokemon, your opponent can't play Basic Pokemon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Piloswine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: For each Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's), flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Politoed
Attack1Text: Attach any number of basic Energy cards from your hand to Politoed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Poliwrath
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Poliwrath is your Active Pokemon, you may discard a basic Energy card attached to Poliwrath. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. This power can't be used if Poliwrath is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each Pokemon with a Poke-Body or Poke-Power (yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Raichu.

name: Raikou
AbilityText: To attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you must discard an Energy card attached to Raikou. (Attach the Lightning Energy, and then discard an Energy card from Raikou.)
Attack1Text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Raikou. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

name: Rhydon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy attached to Starmie and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Steelix
AbilityText: All basic Energy cards attached to Steelix provide Metal Energy instead of their usual types.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, you may flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 damage. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Umbreon
AbilityText: As long as Umbreon is your Active Pokemon, Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's) can't use Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Vaporeon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Vaporeon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Vaporeon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and move it to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, ignore this effect.

name: Wigglytuff
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Wigglytuff is on your bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, each player removes up to 2 damage counters from his or her Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if you have already used another Wigglytuff's Good Neighbor Poke-Power this turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of Pokemon you have in play.

name: Xatu
AbilityText: You may attach any Technical Machine to Xatu.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck.

name: Electrode
Attack1Text: If there are any Lightning Energy card in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Electrode.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage to each Pokemon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Electrode does 100 damage to itself.

name: Kabuto
AbilityText: All damage done by attacks to Kabuto from Evolved Pokemon is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Machoke
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Machoke's Mega Punch attack's base damage is 80.

name: Misdreavus
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Count the number of your Pokemon in play with damage counters on them. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Noctowl
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of any player's deck or at up to 2 of any player's Prizes. Put any cards you looked at back in the same order. This power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Omanyte
Attack1Text: Put an Omastar from your hand onto Omanyte. This counts as evolving Omanyte.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with the Defending Pokemon.

name: Persian
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. If he or she has any Trainer cards there, choose 1 of them. You opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Piloswine
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads. Put a damage counter on Piloswine for each heads.

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Starmie but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Wobbuffet
AbilityText: If Wobbuffet becomes Poisoned or Burned by the Defending Pokemon's attack during your opponent's turn, the Defending Pokemon becomes affected by the same Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either is heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Wobbuffet.

name: Abra
AbilityText: As long as there is a Psychic Energy card attached to Abra, its Retreat Cost is 0.

name: Buried Fossil
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a basic Energy card in your hand, you may search your deck for an Omanyte or Kabuto card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put a basic Energy card from your hand into your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Cleffa
Attack1Text: Shuffle a basic Energy card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Delibird
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Technical Machine or Pokemon Tool card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

name: Diglett
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done by attacks to Diglett during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

name: Ditto
AbilityText: Each basic Energy card attached to Ditto provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. Copy copies that attack. This attack does nothing if Ditto doesn't have the Energy necessary to use that attack. (You must still do anything else required in order to use that attack.)

name: Dugtrio
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done by attacks to Dugtrio during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness or Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

name: Dunsparce
AbilityText: As long as the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, Dunsparce's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Eevee
Attack2Text: Eevee does 10 damage to itself.

name: Farfetch'd
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Forretress
AbilityText: All damage done by attacks to Forretress is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Gastly
Attack1Text: Put a damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Girafarig
Attack1Text: Take a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokemon and attach it to another of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Girafarig and the Defending Pokemon don't have the same number of Energy cards attached to them, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 40.

name: Gligar
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Golbat
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Zubat, Golbat, and Crobat on your Bench.

name: Granbull
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

name: Growlithe
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Haunter
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: You may discard up to 2 cards from your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.

name: Heracross
Attack2Text: If there are 4 or more damage counters on Heracross, this attack's base damage is 50 instead of 30.

name: Hoothoot
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Houndour
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Houndour.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Houndour.

name: Igglybuff
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your Pokemon with an Energy card attached to it. Remove 1 damage counter from that Pokemon.

name: Jigglypuff
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Jigglypuff.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Kadabra
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

name: Kakuna
AbilityText: All damage by attacks to Kakuna is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Lapras
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Ledyba
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Ledyba by attacks is reduced by 20.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Ledyba
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Machop
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. (Do the damage before switching the Pokemon.)

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card that evolves from Magikarp, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Magnemite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any basic Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and move it to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, ignore this effect.

name: Mantine
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads
Attack2Text: Don't apply Resistance.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. If he or she has any Energy cards there, choose 1 of them. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

name: Murkrow
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. Put a damage counter on that Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has a damage counter on it. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

name: Natu
Attack1Text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and rearrange them as you like.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and discard it.

name: Nidoran ♀
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon card named Nidoran ♀ or Nidoran ♂ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Nidoran ♀
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Nidorina
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: Discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Pikachu. This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

name: Pineco
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pineco
Attack1Text: Pineco does 10 damage to itself.

name: Poliwag
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Raticate
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. If you get 1 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If you get 2 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If you get 3 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 60 more damage.

name: Rattata
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Baby Pokemon or Basic Pokemon card and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can't use this attack if your Bench is full.)

name: Rhyhorn
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Rhyhorn.

name: Sandshrew
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If you get at least 1 heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Seel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Seel
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Shuckle

name: Skarmory

name: Slugma

name: Slugma
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Snorlax is your Active Pokemon, you may remove 1 damage counter from Snorlax. Snorlax is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Snorlax is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Snubbull
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, until the end of your opponent's next turn the Defending Pokemon can't attack or retreat.

name: Stantler
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. If he or she has any Trainer cards there, choose 1 of them. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

name: Staryu
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Staryu for each Energy attached to it. If it has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Staryu
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Sunflora
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Sunkern

name: Swinub
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Venonat

Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Weedle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Yanma
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Yanma.

name: Zubat
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)

name: Zubat
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Miracle Sphere α
Attack1Text: If the Pokemon using this attack has Fire and Lightning basic Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If the Pokemon using this attack has Fire and Fighting basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage and remove 3 damage counters from the Pokemon that Miracle Plate α is attached to.

name: Miracle Sphere β
Attack1Text: If the Pokemon using this attack has Fire and Water basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If the Pokemon using this attack has Water and Psychic basic Energy cards attached to it, choose an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon, if any, and your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

name: Miracle Sphere γ
Attack1Text: If the Pokemon using this attack has Grass and Lightning basic Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned. If the Pokemon using this attack has Water and Lightning basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage and lets you put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Mystery Plate α
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If your opponent has only 1 Prize, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned.

name: Mystery Plate β
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, draw 3 cards. If your opponent has only 1 Prize, choose 2 Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokemon (1 if there is only 1). Your opponent shuffles those cards into his or her deck.

name: Mystery Plate γ
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, shuffle your hand into your deck and then draw 6 cards. If your opponent has exactly 2 Prizes, choose 1 of your opponent's Evolved Pokemon. Your opponent puts the top card on that Evolved Pokemon on the bottom of his or her deck. (This counts as devolving that Pokemon.)

name: Mystery Plate δ
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. If your opponent has exactly 2 Prizes, remove all damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Alakazam
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card from 1 of your Pokemon to another of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Arcanine
AbilityText: When you play Arcanine from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to Arcanine.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any.
Attack2Text: Discard all Fire Energy cards attached to Arcanine.

name: Articuno
AbilityText: You can't attach Water Energy cards from your hand to Articuno.
Attack1Text: If there are any Water Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Articuno.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to each of your Pokemon in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Beedrill
AbilityText: When you play Beedrill from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. If you get 1 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If you get 2 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If you get 3 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage. If you get 4 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 90 more damage.

name: Crobat
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent has any Baby Pokemon, Basic Pokemon, or Evolution cards there, choose 1 of them. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck. This power can't be used if Crobat is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. If both of them are tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Dewgong
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't attach Energy cards from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokemon during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost. Damage is calculated using the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost after applying effects to the Retreat Cost.

name: Flareon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Flareon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Flareon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack. If the discarded card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If both coins are heads, switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, do 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. For each tails, do 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gengar
AbilityText: When you play Gengar from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may put a Basic Pokemon (excluding Baby Pokemon) from your discard pile onto your Bench. Then, flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a basic Energy card from your discard pile and attach it to that Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Gyarados
AbilityText: When you play Gyarados from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If Gyarados has 7 or more damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 100.

name: Houndoom
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage times the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon minus the number of your Benched Pokemon. (For example, if your opponent has 3 Benched Pokemon and you have 1, this attack will do 30 damage plus 40 more damage.)

name: Jolteon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Jolteon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Jolteon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon with at least 1 Energy card attached to it (yours and your opponent's).

name: Kabutops
AbilityText: As long as Kabutops is your Active Pokemon, neither player can play Basic Pokemon or Evolution cards from his or her hand to evolve Benched Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Ledian
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, Ledian can't become affected by a Special Condition. (Any other effects of attacks, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, and Trainer cards still happen.)
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Machamp
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks done to Machamp.
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, if your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, ignore this effect.
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Magcargo
Attack1Text: Each player discard the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Magcargo in order to use this attack. If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Magcargo
AbilityText: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokemon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and and then shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent does the same.
Attack1Text: You may discard a Fire or Fighting basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a Fire Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned. If you discard a Fighting Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Magneton
AbilityText: When you play Magneton from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may move any number of basic Energy cards attached to your other Pokemon to Magneton.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Magneton when you use this attack. If you do, put damage counters equal to the amount of Energy cards removed in this way on any number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon in the way you like. (For example, if you discard 3 Lightning Energy cards, you can put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and 2 on another.)

name: Magneton
Attack1Text: If Magneton and the Defending Pokemon don't have the same number of Energy cards attached to them, the player controlling the Active Pokemon with the fewest number of Energy cards attached to it switches 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 damage times the number of your Benched Pokemon minus the number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (For example, if your opponent has 1 Benched Pokemon and you have 3, this attack will do 30 damage plus 20 more damage.)

name: Moltres
AbilityText: You can't attach Fire Energy cards from your hand to Moltres.
Attack1Text: If there are any Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, flip a coin. If heads, attach 1 of them to Moltres.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Moltres.

name: Nidoqueen
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Nidoqueen is on your Bench, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from your Active Pokemon and attach it to your Active Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads

name: Piloswine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: For each Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's), flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Politoed
Attack1Text: Attach any number of basic Energy cards from your hand to Politoed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Poliwrath
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Poliwrath is your Active Pokemon, you may discard a basic Energy card attached to Poliwrath. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. This power can't be used if Poliwrath is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each Pokemon with a Poke-Body or Poke-Power (yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on Raichu.

name: Raikou
AbilityText: To attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Raikou, you must discard an Energy card attached to Raikou. (Attach the Lightning Energy, and then discard an Energy card from Raikou.)
Attack1Text: You may flip a coin. If heads, discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Raikou. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

name: Rhydon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of Energy attached to Starmie and the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokemon.

name: Steelix
AbilityText: All basic Energy cards attached to Steelix provide Metal Energy instead of their usual types.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, you may flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 damage. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Umbreon
AbilityText: As long as Umbreon is your Active Pokemon, Benched Pokemon (yours and your opponent's) can't use Poke-Powers.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Vaporeon
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Vaporeon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Vaporeon.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and move it to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If your opponent has no Benched Pokemon, ignore this effect.

name: Xatu
AbilityText: You may attach any Technical Machine to Xatu.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck.
